*348 Marianne J. Lee, Assistant Bar Counsel (Glenn M. Grossman, Bar Counsel, Attorney Grievance Commission of Maryland), for Petitioner.
Barry S. Brown, Esquire, Baltimore, Maryland, for Respondent.
Argued before: BELL, C.J., HARRELL, BATTAGLIA, GREENE, ADKINS, BARBERA and McDONALD, JJ.
HARRELL, J.
The Attorney Grievance Commission, acting through Bar Counsel (Petitioner), filed a petition for disciplinary or remedial *349 action, pursuant to Maryland Rule 16-751(a)(1),[1] against Barry S. Brown, Esquire (hereinafter, Respondent or Brown).
